name: Toaster Rampage
description:
Get ready to slice and dice your enemies with bread-themed weapons in this action-packed FPS game! Play as a brave citizen battling against an army of robots in a war for survival. Use your trusty Thunder Toast to pierce through enemies or toss a Bagel Bomb to blow them sky high! With a variety of bread-based weapons and power-ups, you'll need to stay alert and keep moving to defeat the robot invasion. Fight through challenging waves and take on the boss in this high-stakes, high-carb battle for victory!

This game was made as a submission to the game jam Indie Game Dev Beginners #003 during one week.  

How to play:

Movement: WASD

Fire: LEFT MOUSE CLICK

Secondary Fire: RIGHT MOUSE CLICK

Upgrade Toaster (when the bar is full):  MOUSE WHEEL CLICK

Pause: ESC, TAB

How to download:

1. Press download

2. Extract the zip file

3. Double left mouse click on the "ToasterRampage" . exe

4. Enjoy!
